WiFi SoC



2022



Filogic 820




ARCH: ARM, Cortex-A53, 


WiFI: abgn + ac + ax





MT7981A(V)
----------

2p 2.5GbE IF, 
2x PCIe 2.0, 
RGMII/SGMII
Wi-Fi 6E (160MHz), 
NAPT, 
HQoS, 
USB
SATA 3.0/eSATA,
SDXC/eMMC flash
ADC,
IR, 
PMIC,
PWM,
RTC,
SPI,
UART



MT7981B(A/V)
------------
2p 2.5GbE IF, 
2x PCIe 2.0, 
RGMII/SGMII
Wi-Fi 6E (160MHz),
NAPT, 
HQoS, 
USB
SDXC/eMMC flash, 
GPIO, 
I2C,
I2S
PMIC, 
PWM, 
SPI, 
UART





## DEVICES

GL.iNet GL-MT2500A (Brume 2)
